src

tzwrapper.h File Reference

Detailed Description

Timezone adjustment class, wrapping the TZ environment variable to make struct tm -> time_t conversions easier.

Definition in file tzwrapper.h.

#include "dll.h"
#include <string>
#include <time.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
